h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: However, if you don't see the legs gleam when she spreads them wide, it will be a feint attack, and she'll quickly raise a single talon high that will gleam alone, before slamming it down on your position.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
However, if you don't see the legs gleam when she spreads them wide, it will be a feint attack, and she'll quickly raise a single talon high that will gleam alone, before slamming it down on your position.
